statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data;
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE attrition_predicted = TRUE ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employee_performance_data WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, performance_rating, salary FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY department ASC, salary DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE department = 'Sales' AND salary < 50000
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM employee_performance_data WHERE attrition_predicted = TRUE ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 70000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT department, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM employee_performance_data GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 3
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, age, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT id, name, age FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM attrition_predictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, predicted_attrition FROM attrition_predictions WHERE predicted_attrition = 'High';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY department, name DESC;
SELECT name, department, performance_rating FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.age, a.predicted_attrition, a.prediction_date FROM employees e JOIN attrition_predictions a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.age < 25;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.department, ap.prediction_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN attrition_predictions ap ON e.id = ap.employee_id WHERE ap.employee_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, predicted_attrition FROM attrition_predictions WHERE prediction_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, position DESC;
SELECT employee_name, salary, performance_rating FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, predicted_attrition FROM employees JOIN attrition_predictions ON employees.employee_id = attrition_predictions.employee_id WHERE predicted_attrition = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE attendance_score > 80;
SELECT full_name, age, department FROM employee_personal_information ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT employee_id, attrition_probability, predicted_attrition_date FROM attrition_prediction WHERE attrition_probability > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, age FROM employee_personal_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, attendance_score, project_completion_rate FROM employee_performance_data WHERE attendance_score <= 80;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employee_personal_information WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT employee_id, attrition_probability, predicted_attrition_date FROM attrition_prediction ORDER BY attrition_probability DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_id, position FROM Employee WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM Employee;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Department GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC, department ASC, employee_id
SELECT name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE performance_rating > 3 AND department = 'IT' ORDER BY name
SELECT e.name, d.department_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_name WHERE e.performance_rating > 2
SELECT e.name, pr.rating, pr.review_date FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceReview pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.rating > 3 ORDER BY pr.review_date DESC

SELECT m.name AS manager_name, d.department_name, e.name AS employee_name FROM Manager m JOIN Department d ON m.department_id = d.department_id JOIN Employee e ON d.manager_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY d.department_name, e.name
